name: Watch The Sheep
description:
WARNING : There's a big bug I can't fix during the voting period, you start the game at the wrong position so the game is broken because of it, sorry !
You can check my twitter on my itchio profile to play but I can't post any direct link here...

You're a nice shepherd and must lead a sheep to the top of the mountain so she can be happy. 

Be careful to not walk too far away from your sheep or you'll make her very sad. 

On your way to the top you will find opportunities to bond with her. 

Watch her, lead her, take care of her !

Wait... Did you hear that voice ?

Use ARROWS to move the Shepherd.
Use SPACE to lead your sheep with yourn bell and interact with the environment.
Use ENTER & ARROWS to interact with text boxes.

Background tileset and shepherd spritesheet are RPG Maker graphic resources.
Sheep spritesheet is inspired by famous Windows pet : eSheep.
